relation: Rock climbing, wake boarding, hiking, dancing.
Good local food nearby for cheap
Friends who live in student housing have enjoyed the relationships they have established.
Dixie State will challenge you, but also help you instead of just expecting you to know everything already.
Take a campus tour and utilize the free tutoring and library aids.
Dixie State is a great school offering a good education and a cheap tuition. The weather on campus is nice all year round. The staff and especially teachers are really helpful.

textAfterTable: Cort from St. George, UT 11/21/2010 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 84 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Dixie is awesome for students who live in St. George(or near by) who don't wish to go to a costly large university and just want to stay local. This school is also great for those that wish to get into the Nursing field because of the school's amazing Nursing program. Another awesome part of the medical programs at the school is if you wish to transfer to say the University of Utah, acceptance of those students are way high, because the University of Utah knows of Dixie's excellent teaching and wish for those students to come. The list goes on and on. Tips for prospective students For tips, make sure to go to Dixie events and other out of class activities, it is really the best way to get the best out of your college experience, you can always have fun at Dixie, you just need
